title: The Women's Murder Club Set
description: The Women s Murder Club -- a homicide sergeant, a medical examiner, an investigative reporter, and a district attorney -- bring together all their talents to stop San Francisco s most notorious killers, even while the stress of each blood-curdling crime threatens to tear them apart. In this thrilling Women s Murder Club book bundle, you'll thrill to the exploits of Lindsay Boxer, Claire Washburn, Cindy Thomas, and Yuki Castellano. The set includes:1st to Die2nd Chance3rd Degree4th of JulyThe 5th HorsemanThe 6th Target7th Heaven
author: James  Patterson
